publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4265 Brian Adam: No to Closure of the Raeden Centre, Aberdeen—That the Parliament welcomes the proposals to abandon the closure of the Raeden Centre in Aberdeen and the promise that there will be no withdrawal of services for children currently attending the Raeden Centre and commends the stakeholders, particularly the parents, for their successful campaign.

S2M-4265 Brian Adam: No to Closure of the Raeden Centre, Aberdeen—That the Parliament welcomes the proposals to abandon the closure of the Raeden Centre in Aberdeen and the promise that there will be no withdrawal of services for children currently attending the Raeden Centre and commends the stakeholders, particularly the parents, for their successful campaign. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*, Robin Harper*
S2M-4265 No to Closure of the Raeden Centre, Aberdeen (lodged on 20 April 2006) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-4265 No to Closure of the Raeden Centre, Aberdeen (lodged on 20 April 2006) Fiona Hyslop*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Mr Adam Ingram*, John Swinburne*
S2M-4265 No to Closure of the Raeden Centre, Aberdeen (lodged on 20 April 2006) Shiona Baird*
S2M-4265 No to Closure of the Raeden Centre, Aberdeen (lodged on 20 April 2006) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-4265 No to Closure of the Raeden Centre, Aberdeen (lodged on 20 April 2006) Eleanor Scott*
